title: Item sets?
body:
I have the new client and I cannot for the life of me find where to edit/add/delete my item sets.

Did Riot forget to add item sets on the new client?

I have my old sets from the old client available in-game, but I can't access it on te client itself.

replies.body: Under the legacy version I cannot get past using the (Launch) button on the launcher. It simply closes the launcher and doesn't launch the legacy client. I needed to change my item sets and I can't do that since the legacy client refuses to launch. I have tried the repair option and have fully reinstalled LoL and it still doesn't work.

I don't believe item sets are currently available in the current version of the updated client, but feel free to offer any feedback you have on the [client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  In the meantime, item sets are still available in the legacy version:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if that clears things up!
